name: The Cultivators of Stone (LIGHT)
description:
This brief expansion for LIGHT offers a new enemy faction, new legendary weapons, a new tag, and a brand new Title - new abilities Beacons can gain by fulfilling a particular criteria.

The Cultivators of Stone are skilled biotechnicians, using gene-splicing and stolen Ruin magic to shape fungal tissue to their whims. Their cultivars are highly invasive and resilient, hijacking their foes. Primarily Earth-based, the Cultivators have spread to every planet in the solar system where their fungal lifeforms can flourish. You can find them studying the Blue Forest, and you can find them lurking below your cities.

Beacons are not immune to their corruption! Beacons who perish while fighting the Cultivators will find themselves Infested with their fungal growths, gaining new abilities at an unknown cost.
